title: Examples
code: library(cbssuitabilityhaiti) library(tidyverse) library(here) library(sf) library(tmap) library(spData) library(janitor) library(devtools)

title: Examples
text: Haiti island state Caribbean sea. four administrative levels 3rd level used emphasize data article. 3rd administrative level contains 134 areas. article extended area around Cap Haïtien l’Acul-du-Nord explored depicted @fig-northern-area.
code: ### explore Cap-Haitien data # view(haiti_adm3)  # explore Haiti adm3 area data  tmap_mode("view") #> tmap mode set to interactive viewing  haiti_adm3 |>    tm_shape() +   tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE) +   tm_borders() +   tm_fill(col = "orange", alpha = 0.6) +   tm_shape(filter(haiti_adm3, (ID_2 == 24 | ID_2 == 25) & ID_3 != 76 & ID_3 != 80)) +   tm_borders() +   tm_fill(col = "yellow", alpha = 0.6) #> Warning: The shape haiti_adm3 is invalid. See sf::st_is_valid # find Cap-Haitien data # mwater |> #   tabyl(Administra) # okap |> #   tabyl(cte)

title: Categorized data for neighborhoods in Haiti — okap
Categorized data for neighborhoods in Haiti — okap
text: tibble 198 rows 21 variables: neighborho Unique identifying number neighborhood unit name Name nieghborhood unit sup_km2 Area neighborhood square km sector_id NULL cte Name commune (administrative unit Haiti) qlty_water Unknown qty_water Unknown health_car Unknown schooling Unknown transport Unknown economy Categorical socioeconomic status (low, medium) ranking Unknown sup_bati area neihborhood covered buildings square meters density Categorical population density (least dense, somewhat dense, dense, dense, dense) aptitude suitability site wastewater treatment system zoning "group" collective grouped sanitation possible short term. latrine Suggested pit latrine septic allowance (allowed, allowed) standing Unknown density_ra Catgoriccal population density according description variable "density" (values 1 5) economy_nu Categotical socioeconomic status according description variable "economy" (1=low, 2 = medium) geometry Geospatial data neighborhood stored polygon
